## compareBumpSeverity() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Compares two bump types and returns which is more severe. Severity order: major, minor, patch (most to least severe).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function compareBumpSeverity(a: ChangesetBumpType | null | ReleaseType, b: ChangesetBumpType | null | ReleaseType): number;
```

</td><td>

[ChangesetBumpType](./changeset-change-detector.changesetbumptype.md) \| null \| [ReleaseType](./change-detector-core.releasetype.md)


</td><td>

First bump type


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

b


</td><td>

[ChangesetBumpType](./changeset-change-detector.changesetbumptype.md) \| null \| [ReleaseType](./change-detector-core.releasetype.md)


</td><td>

Second bump type


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

Positive if a is more severe, negative if b is more severe, 0 if equal
